description: 25-year-old Mafia criminal initially mistaken as Mukuro Rokudo. As a child, he was adopted by the leader of a Mafia family in Northern Italy. The same family would later take in a young Mukuro, who periodically mind controls Lancia, and even makes him slay his entire family. Lancia eventually falls under Mukuro`s complete control, losing his will to fight and forgetting his own name, and is soon captured and jailed.
name: Lancia
